aboutUsText: Terstar is a Polish clothing brand with a 30-year tradition that designs and sews its clothes with passion, commitment and the utmost attention to every detail. The collections are directed at men who value comfort, appearance and functionality of clothing. The style proposed by the brand is a timeless classic elegance with sophisticated accessories and a hint of current fashion trends. The original designs of experienced designers, refined, proven cuts and special attention to the details of finishing make Terstar clothing meet the high requirements of its customers for many years.
offerText: The offer includes a wide range of clothing, especially: jackets, vests, shirts, pants and t-shirts. The products are offered in 2 lines: basic - Alpha and oversized - King. Both series differ in offered sizes, cut styles and solutions prepared for a given figure. For more information, to receive sales or graphic materials, please contact us by phone or via the form.
contactCompanyAddress: PTAK Shopping Center Hall A-Bis sector S, place. 8 & 9 Rzemieslnicza 35 Street 95-030 Rzgow, Poland
contactFormDisclaimert: By completing the contact form, you agree to the processing of personal data by the Terstar brand, to provide an answer to your query. Providing data is voluntary but necessary to process your request. Please be advised that your consent may be withdrawn at any time. You also have the right to inspect your data and correct it.
